[ build: x86 ]
make clean;make distclean
export API=21
export NDK=/home/frank/Android/Sdk/ndk/26.1.10909125
export TOOLCHAIN=$NDK/toolchains/llvm/prebuilt/linux-x86_64
export CC=$TOOLCHAIN/bin/i686-linux-android$API-clang
export CXX=$TOOLCHAIN/bin/i686-linux-android$API-clang++
export CPU="x86"
export ARCH="x86"
./configure --prefix=./android/x86 \
--enable-cross-compile \
--cross-prefix=$TOOLCHAIN/bin/llvm- \
--sysroot=$TOOLCHAIN/sysroot \
--target-os=android \
--arch=$ARCH \
--cpu=$CPU \
--cc=$CC \
--cxx=$CXX \
--disable-asm --disable-programs --disable-ffmpeg --disable-ffplay --disable-ffprobe --disable-shared --disable-doc --disable-filters --disable-vfp \
--disable-avdevice --disable-avfilter --disable-encoders --disable-decoders \
--enable-decoder=h264 --disable-protocols --disable-muxers --disable-demuxers \
--disable-parsers --disable-bsfs --disable-protocols --disable-network --disable-devices --disable-symver --disable-vulkan


[ build: armeabi-v7a ]
make clean;make distclean
export API=21
export NDK=/home/frank/Android/Sdk/ndk/26.1.10909125
export TOOLCHAIN=$NDK/toolchains/llvm/prebuilt/linux-x86_64
export CC=$TOOLCHAIN/bin/armv7a-linux-androideabi$API-clang
export CXX=$TOOLCHAIN/bin/armv7a-linux-androideabi$API-clang++
export CPU="armv7-a"
export ARCH="arm"
./configure --prefix=./android/armeabi-v7a \
--enable-cross-compile \
--cross-prefix=$TOOLCHAIN/bin/llvm- \
--sysroot=$TOOLCHAIN/sysroot \
--target-os=android \
--arch=$ARCH \
--cpu=$CPU \
--cc=$CC \
--cxx=$CXX \
--extra-cflags='-march=armv7-a -mtune=cortex-a9 -ffunction-sections -funwind-tables -mfloat-abi=softfp -mfpu=neon -DANDROID -DNDEBUG' \
--extra-ldflags='-lm -lz -Wl,--no-undefined -Wl,-z,noexecstack' \
--disable-asm --disable-programs --disable-ffmpeg --disable-ffplay --disable-ffprobe --disable-shared --disable-doc --disable-filters --disable-vfp \
--disable-avdevice --disable-avfilter --disable-encoders --disable-decoders \
--enable-decoder=h264 --disable-protocols --disable-muxers --disable-demuxers \
--disable-parsers --disable-bsfs --disable-protocols --disable-network --disable-devices --disable-symver --disable-vulkan

make -j8;make install
